label: 三蹟
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Ono no Michikaze (894-966), Fujiwara Sukemasa [944-98], and Fujiwara Yukinar (972-1028) have tranditionally been called the Three Masters of Japanese-Style Calligraphy (p. 103n). [小野道風、藤原佐理、藤原行成]
